channel.title: Bickley & Marotta
channel.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
channel.description: Dan Bickley is the lead columnist for AZCentral Sports and a Valley radio veteran. Bickley has been a writer for 26 years and on the radio for 10. Vince Marotta is the editor of ArizonaSports.com and has 17 years of on-air experience to his credit. Together they aim to give listeners a different look at the world of sports and beyond every weekday from noon until 2:00 p.m.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Dan Bickley is the lead columnist for AZCentral Sports and a Valley radio veteran. Bickley has been a writer for 26 years and on the radio for 10. Together they aim to give listeners a different look at the world of sports and beyond every weekday from noon until 2:00 p.m.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The Cardinals will miss Darnell Dockett this season, after suffering an ACL tear. Larry Fitzgerald discusses his injured teammate, and looks ahead to the 2014 NFL season.
item.description: The Cardinals will miss Darnell Dockett this season, after suffering an ACL tear. Larry Fitzgerald discusses his injured teammate, and looks ahead to the 2014 NFL season.

item.title: August 19, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Chris Sheridan believes that there is one team in the NBA that could sign Eric Bledsoe to a max contract. Kent Somers says the Cardinals had Brett Keisel in town, but will not likely sign him.
item.description: Chris Sheridan believes that there is one team in the NBA that could sign Eric Bledsoe to a max contract. Kent Somers says the Cardinals had Brett Keisel in town, but will not likely sign him.

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Bruce Arians says Ted Larsen will slide to guard once Lyle Sendlein returns from injury. Does the little league world series get too much attention?
item.description: Bruce Arians says Ted Larsen will slide to guard once Lyle Sendlein returns from injury. Does the little league world series get too much attention?

item.title: August 18, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Vince are pleased with the look of the new ASU football helmets. Walt Powell talks about fighting for a job on a Cardinals team that is stacked at receiver.
item.description: Dan and Vince are pleased with the look of the new ASU football helmets. Walt Powell talks about fighting for a job on a Cardinals team that is stacked at receiver.

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Will Rob Manfred prove to be a good choice as the next commissioner of baseball? Is it a bad sign when players fight at NFL training camps?
item.description: Will Rob Manfred prove to be a good choice as the next commissioner of baseball? Is it a bad sign when players fight at NFL training camps?

item.title: August 15, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Bob Nightengale of USA Today Sports gives his opinions on Rob Manfred as the new commissioner of the MLB. Craig Grialou provides an update on ASU football training camp.
item.description: Bob Nightengale of USA Today Sports gives his opinions on Rob Manfred as the new commissioner of the MLB. Craig Grialou provides an update on ASU football training camp.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: John Abraham is back in training camp, and rumor has it that he lost some weight. ASU offensive lineman Chip Sarafin announces that he is gay.
item.description: John Abraham is back in training camp, and rumor has it that he lost some weight. ASU offensive lineman Chip Sarafin announces that he is gay.

item.title: August 14, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Cardinals quarterback Logan Thomas discusses his success against the Texans. The Diamondbacks faced former teammate Trevor Bauer on Wednesday.
item.description: Cardinals quarterback Logan Thomas discusses his success against the Texans. The Diamondbacks faced former teammate Trevor Bauer on Wednesday.

item.title: August 13, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Does Trevor Bauer have a beef with any of his former teammates? Cardinals defensive coordinator Todd Bowles recognizes the talented offenses in the NFC West.
item.description: Does Trevor Bauer have a beef with any of his former teammates? Cardinals defensive coordinator Todd Bowles recognizes the talented offenses in the NFC West.

item.title: August 12, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: With Donald Sterling gone, who is the worst owner in sports? Dan Williams thinks the Cardinals are destined to duplicate their success from the 2013 season.
item.description: With Donald Sterling gone, who is the worst owner in sports? Dan Williams thinks the Cardinals are destined to duplicate their success from the 2013 season.

item.title: August 12, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: YahooSports NBA writer Adrian Wojnarowski makes some sense of the Eric Bledsoe free agency situation. Cardinals offensive lineman Earl Watford discusses playing wherever the coaches need him.
item.description: YahooSports NBA writer Adrian Wojnarowski makes some sense of the Eric Bledsoe free agency situation. Cardinals offensive lineman Earl Watford discusses playing wherever the coaches need him.

item.title: August 11, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: NASCAR driver Tony Stewart runs over another driver during a sprint car race. Cardinals head coach Bruce Arians expresses his happiness with how his team played in their first preseason game.
item.description: NASCAR driver Tony Stewart runs over another driver during a sprint car race. Cardinals head coach Bruce Arians expresses his happiness with how his team played in their first preseason game.

item.title: August 11, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Rory McIlroy will look to become the face of golf as he wins his fourth major tournament. Cardinals running back Zach Bauman leads the Cardinals in rushing yards against the Texans.
item.description: Rory McIlroy will look to become the face of golf as he wins his fourth major tournament. Cardinals running back Zach Bauman leads the Cardinals in rushing yards against the Texans.

item.title: August 8, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: The NFL preseason has arrived. Who needs to impress in order to keep their roster spot? Kevin Durant officially withdrew from Team USA. Did his decision have to do with the Paul George injury?
item.description: The NFL preseason has arrived. Who needs to impress in order to keep their roster spot? Kevin Durant officially withdrew from Team USA. Did his decision have to do with the Paul George injury?

item.title: August 8, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Chris Karpman talks Sun Devil football and whether a 10 win season is possible. Also, what did Dan Le Batard do to get suspended by ESPN?
item.description: Chris Karpman talks Sun Devil football and whether a 10 win season is possible. Also, what did Dan Le Batard do to get suspended by ESPN?

item.title: August 7, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: NFL Network analyst Daniel Jeremiah talks about Johnny Manziel, and the Jaguars new pool. Should the NFC West be worried about the St. Louis Rams? And the NCAA hands power to the Power 5 conferences.
item.description: NFL Network analyst Daniel Jeremiah talks about Johnny Manziel, and the Jaguars new pool. Should the NFC West be worried about the St. Louis Rams? And the NCAA hands power to the Power 5 conferences.

item.title: August 7, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Cardinals offensive tackle Jared Veldheer describes what it's like going against the Cardinals defense every day in practice. The Cleveland Cavaliers and the Minnesota Timberwolves have reached a deal for Kevin Love.
item.description: Cardinals offensive tackle Jared Veldheer describes what it's like going against the Cardinals defense every day in practice. The Cleveland Cavaliers and the Minnesota Timberwolves have reached a deal for Kevin Love.

item.title: August 6, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Miguel Montero says the D-backs didn't intentionally hit Andrew McCuthcen. Cardinals defensive back Rashad Johnson shares the words of wisdom he received from a Pro Football Hall of Famer.
item.description: Miguel Montero says the D-backs didn't intentionally hit Andrew McCuthcen. Cardinals defensive back Rashad Johnson shares the words of wisdom he received from a Pro Football Hall of Famer.

item.title: August 6, 2014 - Hour: 2
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Tony La Russa says he doesn't understand the criticism of the D-backs. Eagles defensive back Cary Williams stands by his comments about the New England Patriots. After withdrawing from his last tournament, will Tiger Woods play in the US Open?
item.description: Tony La Russa says he doesn't understand the criticism of the D-backs. Eagles defensive back Cary Williams stands by his comments about the New England Patriots. After withdrawing from his last tournament, will Tiger Woods play in the US Open?

item.title: August 5, 2014 - Hour: 1
item.itunes:author: Arizona Sports
item.itunes:summary: Cardinals defensive end Calais Campbell talks about what his goals are for this season. Should fans support the D-backs new reputation? Have the Cleveland Cavaliers finally won the Kevin Love sweepstakes?
item.description: Cardinals defensive end Calais Campbell talks about what his goals are for this season. Should fans support the D-backs new reputation? Have the Cleveland Cavaliers finally won the Kevin Love sweepstakes?
